name: Tomato Onion Chutney
recipeIngredient: 2 medium, ripe tomatoes, seeded, peeled and finely chopped, about 1/2 pound

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a small saucepan over high heat. Add the cumin seeds, and when they start to sizzle, stir in the onion. Saute over medium heat until the onion is tender, about four minutes.
Add the tomatoes and cook over high heat for about five minutes, or until the mixture thickens. Season with salt and pepper, stir in the lemon juice and allow to cool to room temperature.
